title: WAMC News Podcast - Episode 343
dc:creator: WAMC Northeast Public Radio
description: We speak with the mayor of Kingston, N.Y., Democrat Steve Noble, about his $50 million budget proposal for a city that has seen an influx of residents and spending from downstate.
